creator: mi+apache@aldan.algebra.com
text:
The two pieces should be separate. mod_websh.so should contain Apache glue only
and link with the libwebsh.so for the rest.

PREFIX/bin/websh should not exist at all -- instead, TCL-scripts desiring websh
should simply begin with `package require Websh'...

This will be cleaner and eliminate redundancy.

I understand what you mean, but by solving bug 41576 I think we're good enough.
(Note that the websh binary is admittedly a legacy build artifact, but at least
within our company, it is pretty widely used and I don't want to give it up yet...)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
